name: SWARM SDLC Framework
description: Complete AI-native SDLC with structured knowledge capture. Implements the SWARM methodology: Scrum for AI agent swarms with hierarchical knowledge consolidation from repo to enterprise level.
author: recursive-ai

contents.name: swarm-ideate
contents.description: Transform a vague idea into a well-defined story with acceptance criteria

contents.name: swarm-plan
contents.description: Break a story into tasks, assign agents, and establish dependencies

contents.name: swarm-execute
contents.description: Execute planned tasks by spawning agents in dependency order

contents.name: swarm-verify
contents.description: Verify all acceptance criteria are met with concrete evidence

contents.name: swarm-close
contents.description: Generate retrospective, extract knowledge, capture learnings, and archive the story

contents.name: swarm-retro
contents.description: Standalone knowledge extraction from any retrospective

contents.name: swarm-run
contents.description: Full SDLC pipeline with phase gating: ideate to close in one command

contents.name: qa-engineer
contents.description: QA specialist for testing and validation

contents.name: tech-writer
contents.description: Documentation specialist for retrospectives and knowledge capture

contents.name: devops
contents.description: Infrastructure specialist for CI/CD and deployment

contents.name: swarm-init
contents.description: Bootstrap template for initializing SWARM in any project

install.postInstall: Run /swarm-ideate to create your first story
